sentences.sContent: His revolutionary work in linguistics has aroused intense scholarly interest.
sentences.sCn: 他在语言学方面的革命性著作引起了强烈的学术兴趣。

remMethod.val: a ＋ rouse(唤醒， 激起) → 引起； 唤起， 唤醒

trans.tranOther: If something arouses a particular reaction or attitude in people, it causes them to have that reaction or attitude.
